players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie was killed last night, so he must be mafia. We should vote him out."
Bob: "I investigated Alice and found she is mafia. She killed Charlie last night."
You: "Bob, I didn't kill Charlie. I was with Diana. Maybe you misinterpreted."
You: "Bob, you claim you investigated me and found me mafia, but I was with Diana. Charlie was killed by someone else. Maybe you misinterpreted. I didn't kill him."
Diana: "Bob, you investigated Alice and found she is mafia. Alice, you’re lying. Vote Alice."
Bob: "I investigated Alice, found she's mafia. Charlie was killed by mafia. Vote Alice."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie was killed last night, so he must be mafia. We should vote him out."
You: "I investigated Alice and found she is mafia. She killed Charlie last night."
Alice: "Bob, I didn't kill Charlie. I was with Diana. Maybe you misinterpreted."
Alice: "Bob, you claim you investigated me and found me mafia, but I was with Diana. Charlie was killed by someone else. Maybe you misinterpreted. I didn't kill him."
Diana: "Bob, you investigated Alice and found she is mafia. Alice, you’re lying. Vote Alice."
You: "I investigated Alice, found she's mafia. Charlie was killed by mafia. Vote Alice."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
